ygData.subject: Re: Anyone Know
ygData.msgSnippet: Sense summoned turns your body so that it is pointing towards the nearest summoned creature. Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard ... From: ulrich1@earthlink.net
ygData.messageBody:
Sense summoned turns your body so that it is pointing towards the nearest
summoned creature.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard
